feed.title: Combined summary - July 4th 2015 invalid block fork postmortem BIP number request

entry.title: Combined summary - July 4th 2015 invalid block fork postmortem BIP number request
entry.summary: The message shared by the author states that they are planning to assign themselves a BIP number for a postmortem event. The author has already contacted parties affected by the fork to gather information. However, they do not plan on drafting yet and are requesting anyone aware of impacted services or infrastructure to contact them off-list.Furthermore, the author is open to contributions from those interested in analyzing the situation. They have also mentioned that they will link interested parties to their repository when they begin drafting. The author emphasizes the need to collect more data before drawing any conclusions from it.Overall, the message suggests that the author is taking a proactive approach towards investigating the fork and gathering information from various sources. They seem to be focused on understanding the impact on services and infrastructure, as well as collecting more data before reaching any conclusions.
